name: @lando/platformsh
description: A Lando plugin that provides a tight integration with Platform.sh.
author: Mike Pirog @pirog

scripts.generate:tests: leia "examples/**/README.md" test -r 2 -s 'Start up tests' -t 'Verification commands' -c 'Destroy tests' --split-file --spawn --stdin
scripts.test:unit: nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --timeout 5000 test/**/*.spec.js experimental/**/test/*.spec.js integrations/**/test/*.spec.js plugins/**/test/**/*.spec.js
